head.title: Warnaco Wins Round Against Calvin Klein

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Fashion, Beauty and Fitness

hedline.hl1: Warnaco Wins Round Against Calvin Klein

abstract.p: Federal judge denies motion to dismiss all but one and part of another of nine counts in counterclaim lawsuit that Warnaco has filed against Calvin Klein Inc on breach of Klein jeanswear license (S)

block.p: In a battle between Calvin and Linda, strike up one for Warnaco and its chief executive, Linda Wachner.
A federal judge denied a motion yesterday to dismiss all but one and part of another of the nine counts in a counterclaim lawsuit that Warnaco had filed against Calvin Klein Inc.
In a battle between Calvin and Linda, strike up one for Warnaco and its chief executive, Linda Wachner.
A federal judge denied a motion yesterday to dismiss all but one and part of another of the nine counts in a counterclaim lawsuit that Warnaco had filed against Calvin Klein Inc.
The decision in United States District Court in Manhattan moves Warnaco closer to presenting its case for who breached the Klein jeanswear license.

The dispute began this spring, when Calvin Klein failed to find a buyer for his company and withdrew it from the market. In June, the company filed suit to break a licensing pact with Warnaco. Warnaco filed counterclaims, asserting that Mr. Klein had hurt the jeanswear business by providing unsaleable designs, failing to advertise effectively and engaging in a smear campaign.
